item.title: Linguine with Pesto and Potatoes
item.description: Ingredients 2 maris piper or tohter large potatoes, cut into small cubes 60ml/4tbsp olive oil 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped 1 packet of dried linguine salt and pepper 150 ml/5¼fl oz vegetable stock 15ml/1tbsp mascarpone cheese For the pesto: 2 bunches of watercress, roughly chopped 180g/6¼oz almonds, crushed 180g/6¼oz parmesan, grated juice of one lemon 175ml/6¼fl oz olive oil salt and pepper Method First prepare the pesto. Tip the watercress, almonds, parmesan and lemon juice into a food processor and blitz, gradually pouring in the oil.
